hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
source /opt/vappio-scripts/clovrEnv.sh qhost -q > /opt/hudson/qhosttest/expected qhost -q -xml | xpath -e '//queue/@name' > /opt/hudson/qhosttest/queues hostname -f > /opt/hudson/qhosttest/expectedhosts qhost -q -xml | xpath -e '//host/@name' > /opt/hudson/qhosttest/hosts
/opt/hudson/qhosttest/qhost.pl /opt/hudson/qhosttest/qhost2.pl
